Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers

Class PrometheusController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.PrometheusController
public class PrometheusController
extends GodController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Prometheus's God Power.

  • Field Summary

    • runPhases

      public java.lang.String runPhases​(Worker worker) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the phases of a turn: moving and building (which may be allowed two times, both before and after moving).
      Overrides:
      runPhases in class GodController
      Parameters:
      worker - the active Worker
      Returns:
      "winConditionAchieved" if the Player won, "next" if the game goes on, "outOfMoves" if the Worker can't move, "outOfBuilds" if the Worker can't build
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • checkMoves

      boolean checkMoves()
      Returns:
      true if any move from a level to the same level or less is allowed, false otherwise

    • movePhase

      void movePhase() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the moving phase of the turn. If the Player didn't build before moving, normally handles the phase, otherwise doesn't allow him to move up.
      Overrides:
      movePhase in class GodController
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • findPossibleMovesNoUp

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> findPossibleMovesNoUp​(Cell workerPosition)
      Finds all the possible moves that don't require move up.
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where a Worker can move

    • buildPhase

      void buildPhase() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the building phase of a turn, which may be duplicated (before and after moving). Calls displayBuild with a non-null Card parameter if the Prometheus God Power was used.
      Overrides:
      buildPhase in class GodController
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs
